attributes.contentHtml: yeah, what you gotta say now @mituishere?
Chirag the thing is, if it's a public template who the fuck cares? it's just lines of damn code that are public on the internet
Chirag You're dumb because you left ur own website PUBLIC on GitHub and you're the on crying about it LMFAO

Hello everyone.

First of all, I have to say that I did not steal any code, I didn't even use the chirag code.

Chirag yeah, what you gotta say now @mituishere?

I said that since you were very toxic and accusing every moment without reason, in short, things of 13-year-old children, and saying that I was a skid without not letting me or explaining

Here is the evidence that it does not use your code:

To add more buttons, just copy the code of a button and paste it, everyone knows how to do it. (I said that in Drama.gg Discord server.)

To add more feature boxes, I just copied and pasted the box code, changing the icon to be varied.

The only part that uses your code is the JS part (Only the dark theme thing), and you cannot consider or steal code since everything is public. I could even recreate it myself. I say only the JS part, because it is only the JS part, even the switch i deleted it and made it default to dark theme.

Please chirag, stop trying to feel special just for 6 public lines of JS.

Now, taking advantage of the fact that there is a thread against you, and you were accusing me, I'm going to have a little fun.


(All these referring to me, without letting even explain, begin toxic, getting angry when everyone agrees with me, and a long list of stuff)


I though all multieggs got an ascii at start, and even your multiegg has the resource thingy, that means you skidded it? Noob

with this I want to make it clear that the only skid / accuser / person that likes to be mad with literally everyone, is chirag.

Thanks to everyone that helped me.
